title: Add Valgrind CI step for C interop leak detection
body:
Add a CI step that runs end-to-end tests under Valgrind to catch memory leaks in C library code (primarily LLVM C API bindings).

**Deliverables:**
- Add Valgrind to the Nix flake dev dependencies
- Create a Valgrind suppression file for known LLVM/system library noise
- Add a GitHub Actions CI step that runs tests under Valgrind
- Document how to run Valgrind locally in CONTRIBUTING.md

**Design notes:**
- This is deferred until the LLVM backend (#53, #54, #55) is actively exercised in tests
- Zig's std.testing.allocator cannot see leaks inside C libraries
- Valgrind needs code built with std.heap.c_allocator for full visibility
- Consider running Valgrind on a subset of tests (e.g. end-to-end only) to limit CI time
- May need -mcpu=baseline for Valgrind compatibility on AVX-512 systems
